trans-unit.source: Turns just-in-time (JIT) activation on or off.
trans-unit.target: 開啟或關閉 Just-In-Time (JIT) 啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: If JIT activation is specified, then it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 JIT 啟動，然後它必須不停用 COM + 目錄中，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: If enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 COM + 目錄中，它必須指定元件上。

trans-unit.source: JIT activation defaults to off for components which are configured in COM+, but is enabled automatically if automatic transactions are requested.
trans-unit.target: JIT 啟用預設為關閉元件已在 COM + 中，但如果自動交易要求會自動啟用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor enables just-in-time (JIT) activation.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式會啟用 Just-In-Time (JIT) 啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute>.
<see langword="true" /> to enable JIT activation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用 JIT 啟動過程，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute" /> class, optionally allowing the disabling of just-in-time (JIT) activation by passing <see langword="false" /> as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see langword="false" /> 當做參數傳遞來選擇性允許 Just-In-Time (JIT) 啟動過程的停用，初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: JIT activation is required and `val` cannot be set to `false` if the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption> value for the transaction is `Supported`, `Required`, or `RequiresNew`.
trans-unit.target: JIT 啟用是必要的和`val`不能設定為`false`如果<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption>值交易是`Supported`， `Required`，或`RequiresNew`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute>.
Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute" /> setting.
<see langword="true" /> if JIT activation is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 JIT 啟動過程，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the value of a `JustInTimeActivation` attribute's <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得的值`JustInTimeActivation`屬性的<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute.Value%2A>屬性。
